title: 420: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Premiere Recap!
itunes:title: 420: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Premiere Recap!
description:
The Bach Broads are back to recap this season of The Bachelorette(s)! They discuss their thoughts on two Bachelorettes, the Clayton slander, their favorite and least favorite limo entrances, who they are falling in love with, who is making them nervous, finale predictions, and much more!

ROSES FOR EVERY BODY:

Sign the petition: https://chng.it/h9vg88T5qrhttps://chng.it/h9vg88T5qr

Follow Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rosesforeverybody/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM and use promo code CHATTYBROADS to save an additional 15% off your first order!

***TALKSPACE: Go to TALKSPACE.COM and use code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month!

***EVERLYWELL: Everly well is offering a special discount of 20% off an at-home lab test at EVERLYWELL.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
